author: REALITATEA.NET
title: Ground News - Romania is partially in Schengen. Nicolae Ciuca: “Nothing would have been possible without the combined efforts of all involved
text:
Summary by REALITATEA.NET Senate President Nicolae Ciuca said that “Romania's admission to the Schengen Area is a fulfilled promise”. As it is the most important country goal after integration into the European Union and NATO, the PNL has continuously worked to achieve this country project. All liberal ministers of Home Affairs, Justice and Foreign Affairs from 2019 to today have made the Schengen dossier a priority. The agreement to lift controls at air and sea borders … Share menu More
